UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Identification of novel human immunodeficiency virus type 1-inhibitory peptides based on the antimicrobial peptide database.
Literature.Author: Wang G, Watson KM, Peterkofsky A, Buckheit RW Jr

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=>100µM),Escherichia coli K-12(MIC=>100µM),HIV-1 IIIB(IC50 REP=>48.5µM)
